website_summaries.verdict: This can stands out for its durability and versatility. The sturdy plastic can handle high-use areas, and the white color matches with virtually any home or office décor.
pros: This model lives up to Rubbermaid's reputation for toughness and quality
The plastic is surprisingly thick and can take a lot of use without cracking or scratching
It is compact enough some users report it works well in a vehicle interior
The popular white color matches nicely with most décors
cons: The more compact frame means this can fills up more quickly than other similarly purposed trash cans

customer_reviews.title: ** Rubbermaid Vanity Wastebasket,6-quart, 2 pack ** SAVE THOSE GROCERY BAGS, THEY FIT INSIDE NICELY **
customer_reviews.text: Great quality little trash bin, works real well in my two bathrooms. The size is small, but that's all I need in the small bathrooms. ** Grocery store shopping plastic bags work well inside these and are easy to remove, tie up and dispose of. Nice value to be able to buy two for a reasonable price. Thick plastic-like sturdy material, and withstand a drop on the ceramic floors easily. Sturdy and well built and do the job in a small way. Converting from "quart" size is tricky, so I posted the measurements in the photos to help you decide if this is what you want to buy for your need.
customer_reviews.author: Dan Y

customer_reviews.title: Perfect size for laundry room.
customer_reviews.text: Great little trash can for my laundry room. I was able to get some command hooks to hang the trash can on. The lip of the trash can is just perfect for the hooks. I don't use any kind of trash bag since it's only used in my laundry room for lint and dryer sheets. It's the perfect size to fit between the wall and my dryer.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Hamman

customer_reviews.title: Arrived very dirty
customer_reviews.text: I don’t like that it arrived right out if the box set dirty! There is some type of blue ink or something on the outer and inside as well as some other stuff on the rim and inner part of wastebasket. Very disappointed!
customer_reviews.author: Carol Rutley

customer_reviews.title: Ideal for small spaces
customer_reviews.text: Pretty small but good for a small trashcan in a bathroom, kitchen, or even bedroom. I could see tucking one between your bed and your nightstand if needed. I bought two to put in my kitchen cabinet under the sink, 1 for trash and 1 for recycling. Will probably need to be emptied just about every time a meal is prepared. But I don’t have space for a large trashcan so this is perfect. Could even be used in a car. Nice little bin.
customer_reviews.author: JK

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for a bathroom
customer_reviews.text: This is a really good sturdy little trash can, it fits great under my guest bathroom sink. I use a plastic grocery sack as a liner and it works great!
customer_reviews.author: Amanda Rose

customer_reviews.title: Great customer service!
customer_reviews.text: My order came with only one trashcan, not 2 as advertised. When the seller asked for feedback, I explained the problem, and they immediately offered me either a refund or replacement of the missing trashcan. I opted for the replacement, as the trashcan was the perfect size for my needs. Most of all, I'd like to acknowledge the great customer experience I had with the seller.
customer_reviews.author: Catherine

customer_reviews.title: A great bathroom staple!
customer_reviews.text: We use these for our home bathrooms. The white color is discreet and the slim proportions fit in tight spaces where there is not much floor space near the toilet. The Rubbermaid makes it softer than hard plastic cans that can break and they are easy to clean. This can is perfect for a powder room situation & small enough to fit in an under-sink cabinet. (Narrow, not too tall.)
customer_reviews.author: Kelly L Kerrigan

customer_reviews.title: Good for personal room
customer_reviews.text: It is a sweet size for personal room like dorm rooms. It would definitely be too small if it's in public space. I usually have a plastic bag inside, like the ones I got in the grocery store. It still pretty easy to clean if something got out of the bag and landed inside the bin. Nothing against it.
customer_reviews.author: Xitong Tan

customer_reviews.title: I have a pretty small bathroom (in a pretty small house) and I ...
customer_reviews.text: I have a pretty small bathroom (in a pretty small house) and I needed a trashcan that would fit into the small spaces that aren't already used. This trashcan fits the bathroom perfectly and isn't so small that grocery bags are too big for it. I have thought about buying another one to put in the laundry room just to have something convenient for the trash I find in pockets and the lint I pull out of the dryer.
customer_reviews.author: L. Rowley

customer_reviews.title: no color selection
customer_reviews.text: Everyone knows that Rubbermaid is a brand you can trust. Nice rugged small Wastebasket that can fit anywhere. Only thing is you don't have much of a color selection. I guess that white goes with anything
customer_reviews.author: steve l

customer_reviews.title: Small, moderately sturdy waste basked.
customer_reviews.text: Like that it was available online at a time when it is no longer carried in the local drug stores. Like the rounded top and lip. Liked that is not easy to scratch.
customer_reviews.author: Sharabook

customer_reviews.title: Nice little trash basket
customer_reviews.text: I needed to replace the trash basket on my Hurricane Fun Deck. I ordered the same part number as on the old one but this one was a little different. The rounded lip was a little more lip than the old one so I had to cut it down so that the lid on the trash compartment would lay flat. I guess this new basket was not meant to fit a 2002 Hurricane Fun Deck. No biggie, just didn't realize that the same part number would be a different basket than the one I had.
customer_reviews.author: DAN

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Replacement
customer_reviews.text: Did a bathroom update to bring it from 1975 pink tile/tub to 2020 clean white/gray. Pink trash can of same size/brand had to go, this was the replacement.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: I attached the waste bin to the interior cupboard door of our bathroom ...
customer_reviews.text: Perfectly, as expected. I attached the waste bin to the interior cupboard door of our bathroom vanity with a couple of command adhesive hooks. I just set the waste bin on the 2 that I installed, and the trash is out of sight.
customer_reviews.author: AMarie

customer_reviews.title: REALLY SMALL
customer_reviews.text: Ordered this for use in our bathroom. It is REALLY small & would be best used in a powder room or a guest bathroom where very little would be thrown away in it. I am considering returning this because it is too small to be used in our bathroom.
customer_reviews.author: Cee M Well

customer_reviews.title: Small and unuseable
customer_reviews.text: These are way too small to be used in a personal bathroom, let alone a public one. They are difficult to clean and one broke as I was taking it out of the box
customer_reviews.author: Brooke Pedevillano

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy little trash can
customer_reviews.text: Sturdy, easy to clean, very durable. I down rated it one star because it's very plain utilitarian. If you have a fancy bathroom, it's probably not the right choice.
customer_reviews.author: Texas Jack

customer_reviews.title: Could use in a doll house... lol
customer_reviews.text: Make sure you pay attention to the size. These are very small. They are as advertised, I didn't pay attention to the "quart size".
customer_reviews.author: barbara hathaway

customer_reviews.title: Very lightweight construction.
customer_reviews.text: I had to add stones to the bottom to stop it from tipping over with the slightest nudge: the rim at the top mad it top-heavy! Not sure how they will hold up due to thin construction.
customer_reviews.author: JAMES M.

customer_reviews.title: perfect trash cans
customer_reviews.text: these are right size, well made and are being used in both bathrooms, computer room and the bed room, look good too
customer_reviews.author: William Eynon

customer_reviews.title: Make sure you want a small one
customer_reviews.text: It's your basic Rubbermaid trash can. All I can say is this one's pretty small. Make sure that's what you want. There's a pretty big lip on it, so the opening is smaller than the dimensions might lead you to believe.
customer_reviews.author: monkeydog

customer_reviews.title: Basic, but great
customer_reviews.text: It's a trash can. Small, basic trash can. Because these guys are under my cabinets, I don't really care. Basic and good!
customer_reviews.author: Madeline Bramer

customer_reviews.title: Affordable and simple
customer_reviews.text: It's a trash can. Not sure what else you want me to say, it holds garbage, it's small, it's cheaper than that Simple Human crap.
customer_reviews.author: LuckyHittman

customer_reviews.title: Tiny But Does the Job
customer_reviews.text: It's tiny! But who wants a lot of trash in the bathroom? A plastic shopping bag is a good sized liner, though a little big. Sturdy little thing
customer_reviews.author: Powerpuffed

customer_reviews.title: Nice little barrel!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect size for dryer lint in a small laundry room.
customer_reviews.author: Sandy L.

customer_reviews.title: Very small
customer_reviews.text: Great size for my uses, but mislabeled on measurements. Expect smaller than it says.
customer_reviews.author: Brenda

customer_reviews.title: Great Rubbermaid product!
customer_reviews.text: Great quality product. Use it next to the dryer for lint.

customer_reviews.title: Small, but perfect for little trash.
customer_reviews.text: It was a little smaller than expected, yet it was a perfect fit for under my desk.
customer_reviews.author: William d Knight

customer_reviews.title: Smaller than I thought it would be
customer_reviews.text: Guess I should of paid attention to measurements more, figured this would be your average sized bathroom/office trash can but is actually half of the size, quality material if you like to empty your trash can very frequently:)
customer_reviews.author: wimom

customer_reviews.title: Small and sturdy
customer_reviews.text: Small and sturdy good quality for the price. Looks great in my spa like bathroom.
customer_reviews.author: Phyllis Monaco

customer_reviews.title: Fits like a charm
customer_reviews.text: This is used on our ambulance as a receptacle for garbage in the back. It fits perfectly in the place designed for a small waste receptacle.
customer_reviews.author: Mattawamkeag Fire Department

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: Perfect little trash can for my laundry room to put lint in.
customer_reviews.author: Nephthys Lucsok

customer_reviews.title: Perfect size for a small space
customer_reviews.text: As other reviewers have said, this is a very small wastebasket, but that's exactly what I was looking for to sit next to my computer desk, where I pay bills and respond to e-mails. It fits into a tight space of only about 8" between the desk and the wall, and it helps me keep the area from becoming stacked up with bill envelopes, inserts, etc. It could also work well in a powder room or in a half bath, or in a child's room. I have a much larger Rubbermaid kitchen trash can that I've used for more than 25 years, so if you're looking for something small but sturdy and lightweight, this would be a good choice.
customer_reviews.author: Casey

customer_reviews.title: Compact size.
customer_reviews.text: I love the fact it was small enough to fit uner my make- up table. I use it for make-up trash. Cotton balls, Qtips, eyeliner pencil sharpens and make-up wipes.
customer_reviews.author: Maryann

customer_reviews.title: Great lamp for sewing!
customer_reviews.text: This lamp is very slim and fits nicely behind the sewing table. It's easy to adjust and to is flexible which makes it great for seeing right where I need to while sewing. There are multiple light settings so you can find the one that suits your needs easily. I would definitely buy this again!
customer_reviews.author: Suz

customer_reviews.title: Truth in advertising
customer_reviews.text: I like the size. Perfect for my bathroom. Sturdy and easily cleaned.
customer_reviews.author: Gweeney

customer_reviews.title: Flimsy
customer_reviews.text: Two of them already have cracks in them. Flimsy and not the quality I expected. Disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Debby F.

customer_reviews.title: Great little trashcan
customer_reviews.text: These little trashcans work perfect for the bedroom and next to the recliner. Already had one in the bathroom.

customer_reviews.title: Wow tiny tiny tiny
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this for the laundry area. If you have tissues from pockets to throw out, it’s properly over flowing. It’s pretty much doll house size

customer_reviews.title: Cute trash can
customer_reviews.text: This trash can is small, which is what I wanted. It’s cute and durable. Look at the size before you buy, though, in case you’re looking for something bigger.
customer_reviews.author: Denaya

customer_reviews.title: does it's job it's just small
customer_reviews.text: Smaller than I expected, probably should've read the dimensions more closely. However, it does it's job and it's small so it can get tucked into small spaces so it's less noticeable

customer_reviews.title: Trash out

customer_reviews.text: Very handy trashcan, I use it all the time and have a few of them spread around the house.

customer_reviews.title: For small needs

customer_reviews.title: Perfect size for a truck or car
customer_reviews.text: I keep one of these in the back seat of my double cab Tacoma. It gently wedges in place between the center console and the back seat and can be reached from anywhere in the truck. Grocery bags fit perfectly.

customer_reviews.title: Too small ..long wait

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Waste Basket for my car!
customer_reviews.text: It fits perfect on the hump in the back seat of my car and I can reach it from any seat in the car. My husband mounted it for me so that it doesn't slide around.

customer_reviews.title: I would like to have a little bigger one for my need
customer_reviews.text: I thought that it would be a bit bigger. I would like to have a little bigger one for my need. I still like it.

customer_reviews.title: Very small for practical use.

customer_reviews.text: This is the smallest garbage can I’ve ever seen. I know it’s for a bathroom but it should hold more than a tissue!

customer_reviews.title: Good quality waste basket
customer_reviews.text: Happy with this product, good size for the area I need it for.

customer_reviews.title: Small but Great size for bathroom
customer_reviews.text: This is a great size wastebasket for bathroom used by just one or two people.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I didn't realize how small this trash can was actually going to be it is very small

customer_reviews.title: smallest garbage can EVER!
customer_reviews.text: I have had other small cans in my bathrooms before but this is by far the smallest can I have ever seen. I didnt even know they made cans this little. It does say 6 qt in the description but who knows how big that is! Certainly not me!
customer_reviews.author: Kristin Jorgenson

customer_reviews.title: Very nice for a little girl's room
customer_reviews.text: I bought this wastebasket to go with a "work station" I set up for my 5-year old granddaughter where she plays business woman. It just suits her needs, and she brought it to me with her first candy wrapper in it to show me she's really using it. ;)
customer_reviews.author: zanniegrannie

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for cloth diaper users!!
customer_reviews.text: Other reviewers complained that this was too small. Please read the dimensions carefully. But this is perfect for a diaper pail. It's small enough so that you have to empty it every other day. I use cloth diapers during the day and disposables at night or when we leave the house. So we hardly use disposables and really didn't want a diaper genie or some big ugly diaper pail. Also, having a trash pail with a lid actually makes the diapers smell worse. This is perfect for a few diapers and wipes. Who wants a diaper pail big enough for a whole weeks worth of poopy diapers in your babies room anyways?? Gross!! Love this little bin!
customer_reviews.author: S. Winn

customer_reviews.title: Small can for small spaces.
customer_reviews.text: I needed a small/short trash can for under our bathroom sink. I ordered this item. I checked "buy small trash can" off my to-do list. Perfect for small spaces, you know, like inside sink cabinets. Is there really much else to review?
customer_reviews.author: Cannin314

customer_reviews.title: Frozen Waste
customer_reviews.text: We now have to compost in our city so this fits perfectly in the freezer, keeps the waste frozen and eliminates those nasty odors. Also makes it easier to transport to the waste collection cans.
customer_reviews.author: Raymond A. Souza

customer_reviews.title: Just as I expected
customer_reviews.text: Small wastebasket but just the right size for bathroom. Used to buy at local grocery store or Walmart, but could not find it anymore. Ordered online and received it just as the one I previous owned. Perfect size and last long (I'm still using the previous one purchased several years ago).
customer_reviews.author: Gigi

customer_reviews.title: Rubbermaid Vanity Trash Can Wastebasket 6.0...

customer_reviews.text: These are super small. They are fine for my purposes, but I suggest checking the measurements before you buy.

customer_reviews.title: Smaller than I expected
customer_reviews.text: Can is nice but smaller than I expected. Perfect for a bathroom.

customer_reviews.title: I like these versatile waste bins that fit under most sinks
customer_reviews.text: I like these versatile waste bins that fit under most sinks. I used to find them easily in hardware stores, but no longer.

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable which is a issue with many earphones
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable which is a issue with many earphones. They also stay in position which many others have not. Good quality for the price.

customer_reviews.title: Best little trash can ever
customer_reviews.text: Best little trash can ever. Line it with Glad small trash bags (4 gallon/ 30 count) and enjoy. Its easy to toss QTips right into it out of the shower and its small enough to fit sleek between the tioly and a wall or divider that is close.

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: I should have paid attention to the dimensions very very disappointed. Very small.

customer_reviews.title: the most perfect teeny trash can money can buy
customer_reviews.text: This teeny trash can is perfect for next to my vanity. Tucks nicely into a nook or corner. I definitely recommend. I plan to purchase one for my office soon.

customer_reviews.title: Good for small bathroom!
customer_reviews.text: Standard Rubbermaid small wastebasket. Will fit easily beside toilet. Bought this for my son, probably cheaper elsewhere but good quality.

customer_reviews.title: Useful small size
customer_reviews.text: It is a small garbage can. It serves its purpose. If you were hoping for something that sings and dances, you might be disappointed, but that is just silly. It fits perfectly in a tight space for us (in the laundry room).
customer_reviews.author: Ellie C

customer_reviews.title: Great little rubbish bin
customer_reviews.text: Great little garbage can. Fits great in the little spaces in a bathroom or office area.

customer_reviews.title: Narrow enough for small spaces
customer_reviews.text: Tiny width makes it perfect for cramped spaces. Sturdy. Probably will last forever.

customer_reviews.title: great product

customer_reviews.text: Great all purpose wastebasket. I use them under the bathroom sink, and its the perfect size. Good quality.

customer_reviews.text: Perfect for what we needed, although it is quite small, so make sure to check the dimensions.

This product is very durable, small for those tight areas, we use them in areas that we need the extra space to walk thru. Will order it again.

I ended up getting a different wastebasket for the guest bath (Rubbermaid still, but about 10 times the size) and using this one for my laundry room dryer lint.
